content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
drop view RTG_EcEvents

create view RTG_EcEvents
as 

SELECT
 DISTINCT Week
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'PTP/silver/EcEvents',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA',
        data_source='ptpbianalyticsdata_powerbianalyticsdata_dfs_core_windows_net'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE [cheKind]='ITV'
AND [moveKind] = 'DSCH'
AND ([eventTypeDescription] = 'AYDR' or [eventTypeDescription] = 'CMPL')
and [Week] in (47,46,45,44)
GROUP by [ecEventGkey]
having count(*)>1

select 
--top 10 *
max(([TimeStamp])),MIN((TimeStamp))
from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://powerbianalyticsdata.dfs.core.windows.net/ptpbianalyticsdata/PTP/silver/EcEvents/Year=2021/Month=10/Week=43/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE [cheKind]='RTG'
